data.name: Subway
data.description: At your local Subway®, 53 Church Walk, when we say you can Make It What You Want ®, we really mean it. Create your own sub, salad or wrap and fill it with everything that you love. Fancy something meaty but want to hold off on the olives? Sure. Want to turn up the heat with extra hot sauce? No problem. Want extra cheese on top of extra cheese? If that's what you like! Choose from our delicious range of meats or plant-based alternatives, topped with tasty cheeses, freshly cut veggies, and finished with a choice of our signature sauces. All Subway® stores are independently owned with talented Sandwich Artists™ ready to take your order in-store, for collection via our Subcard® app, or delivered straight to your home via our friends over at Just Eat, Uber Eats or Deliveroo. So go meaty, go plant-based, go spicy, go saucy, or just go ALL OUT.
data.address: 53 Church Walk, Burgess Hill RH15 9BQ England

data.name: Naasta - Indian Street Food

photo.caption:
Paapri Chaat.
A savory that can be found on the streets of India. Crispy flour wafers, topped with chickpeas, potatoes, yoghurt and tamarind sauce. Incredibly tasty! *Vegetarian *Contains gluten *Contains Dairy

data.description: “Naasta”is a word used for snacks. However, some countries define it as breakfast. At Naasta, we use the more generalised term to bring you a new style of food featuring traditional flavours from back home and adding our own contemporary twists, to make it an authentic experience for you. From the streets of India to the Dhabas of Bangladesh, we bring you the finest fusion of south Asian treats in our vibrant and exciting atmosphere. Our food is simple and lovingly prepared to represent the tastes of south Asia today. each dish on our menu has been hand-picked to bring you a style miles away from the curry stereotype. Here at Naasta, we serve you our tapas style Desi bites with a range of choices to suit everyone’s taste buds. we hope you enjoy nourishing your appetite with the good food of south Asia shared at Naasta in the comfort of our restaurant.
